I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped, said Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World As We Know It. "I think Eric Schmidt is burned out." To win this game was big for us http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series. "He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. "Anytime a guy like that is on fire,

Thirty-five of the 49 companies in the S&P 500 that reported earnings since Jan. 10 have topped analyst estimates, with General Electric Morgan Stanley and Bank of America Corp. due to release results today. Recent data suggested the economic performance in Europe has been okay, and probably somewhat better than people expected, said Adrian Eric Schmidt , a currency strategist at Lloyd TSB Bank Plc in London. The euro strengthened 0.5 percent against the dollar, and was 0.3 percent stronger versus the yen. The dollar weakened 0.2 percent
